ANCHOR: Kelsey Grammer and his wife Camille Grammer 's divorce is getting uglier by the minute and last night, Kelsey Grammer showed up on David Letterman with his fiancee and children. Camille Grammer 's children. The David Letterman cutaway shot which cut through Camille Grammer 's heart. The woman she claims Kelsey Grammer cheated on her unleashed an ear-to-ear grin between Camille Grammer and Kelsey Grammer 's two children. COHEN: ''There's a shot of her with the kids on David Letterman .'' CAMILLE: ''He uses them as props. It's tough, it's harsh. It hurts, of course.''

names of stars such as Rihanna and Katy Perry are being thrown into the mix in an attempt to compete with TV giant, American Idol. A friend of Cheryl Cole 's boyfriend, Derek Hough revealed: Everyone thinks Cheryl Cole has the judging job on US X Factor in the bag. ''The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced. ''They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US. of one sun god, Aton. The bust is at the top of a ''wish list'' of five major artefacts exhibited abroad that Egypt wants returned as part of its cultural heritage. Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that ''this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.'' Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti

decision to pull out American forces and leave Saddam Hussein in power. Colin Powell and the other members of President Bush 's national security team agreed that the mission was to liberate Kuwait, not remove Saddam Hussein . There is a legitimate argument as to whether we stopped too soon. We accomplished the mission, Colin Powell said. '' President Bush made the right decision.'' The Iraqi leader was ousted in 2003 during the Iraq war, which started under President Bush 's son, former president President Bush W President Bush .
